product_description: Gloss polyurethane topcoat for structural steel and concrete
recycling_process_description: Product can remain on structural steel when being repurposed.
reusable_description: Product can remain on structural steel when being repurposed.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Bulk supply and materials applied offsite.
minimisation_design_strategy: Product can be ratio mixed to lower quantities to reduce wastage.
modern_slavery_action_plan_comment: Business is ceased with any companies or countries that are identified as forementioned.

material_locations.material: Australia

other_comments: Hempathane is a high solids protective coating gloss topcoat for structural steel in all environments including highly corrosive C5.  If a low gloss finish is required, please nominate Hempathane HS55613
type_of_packaging: Steel Pails which can be re-used or recycled by steel recycling facilities.

product_description: Activated Zinc Rich Primer for highest level corrosion protection
reusable_description: When applied to steel, the coating can be dismantled and reused along with the structural steel.
minimisation_design_strategy: Material can be ratio mixed in smaller volumes to prevent wastage.
modern_slavery_action_plan_comment: Companies or countries identified are prohibited from conducting business with Hempel
risk_of_harm_posed_description: Hazardous material prior to application and curing.  Once cured material is non hazardous.

material_locations.material: Zinc

other_comments: Avantguard 860 incorporates Hempel's patented Activated Zinc Rich technology providing significantly improved utilization of the metallic zinc in the film for longer corrosion protection and asset durability.
type_of_packaging: Steel pails use to package can be reused or recycled.

product_description: High Build Low VOC Epoxy primer intermediate coating for corrosion protection of steel
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Manufactuing in country to reduce transport, & supply in bulk
minimisation_design_strategy: Product can be mixed to smaller volumetric requirements to minimize waste
modern_slavery_action_plan_comment: Withdrawal of business from identified business/countries

material_locations.material: Coating

other_comments: Hempaprime Multi 500 offers class leading low VOC values for primer/intermediate coatings for structural steel.
type_of_packaging: Steel pails are used and can be recycled across Australia at steel recycling facilities

product_description: Wattyl I.D Advanced, delivers a superior level of protection with an ultra-low VOC formula
An ultra-low VOC formula at less than 1g/L, Wattyl I.D Advanced exceeds green-building requirements
minimisation_design_strategy: Accurately measure the area you need to paint to order the required amount of paint through Wattyl's calculator https://wattylreadytogo.com.au/paint-calculator/
other_comments: VOC < 1g/Litre. The VOC level has been calculated theoretically from raw material information in accordance with APAS D181.

product_description: Is a high performance, ultra premium paint, with low VOC, beneficial for indoor air quality
minimisation_design_strategy: Accurately measure the area you need to paint to order the required amount of paint through Wattyl's calculator https://wattylreadytogo.com.au/paint-calculator/
other_comments: VOC < 1g/Litre. The VOC level has been calculated theoretically from raw material information in accordance with APAS D181.

product_name: Taubmans Pure Performance Interior Interior Matt
product_description: High-performance, low VOC acrylic paint with Microban technology
minimisation_design_strategy: Measuring accurate walls/ceilings/door sizes that need painting and using a paint calculator, and paint coverage, work out exactly how much paint is needed
other_comments:
Taubmans Pure Performance Interior Walls Matt is a 100% acrylic high performing water 
based coating formulated for the professional painter. Taubmans Pure Performance Interior 
Walls provides superior opacity, finish, and a very-low VOC. 
Pure Performance Interior Walls Matt reduces broadwall side sheen, hiding wall defects in 
corridors and by windows. Using Pure Performance with its advanced touch-up capabilities for 
spot painting or patched substrates means you achieve a superior finish.
type_of_packaging: Plastic or metal tins on wooden pallets which are shrunk wrapped. This shrink wrapping is compostable. The plastic and metal tins can be recycled through the Paintback scheme.

product_description: Ot Clay is a natural, zero VOC, clay plaster made on the Surf Coast from local materials.
recycled_content_description: Our recycled glass product uses 30% recycled content.
compostable_conditions: The plaster itself, due to the natural content, is compostable.
minimisation_design_strategy: The Applicator can site mix only what is to be used. Any spare can be returned and refunded.
modern_slavery_comments: All materials are Australia made and sourced.
